mapper.insert:
insert into member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_gender, member_age, member_phone, member_social_number, member_nickname, member_point, member_authority_no, member_email, member_agreement, member_sns )
VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_password}, #{member_name},#{member_gender}, #{member_age}, #{member_phone}, #{member_social_number}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_point}, #{member_authority_no}, #{member_email}, #{member_agreement}, #{member_sns});
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, as member_id m.member_pw, as member_pw ma.member_authority_name as authority FROM member m INNER JOIN member_authority ma ON m.member_authority_no = ma.member_authority_no WHERE m.member_id = #{username};
